title: New Smash Bros., Fortnite Character Tonight - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.10.20
description:
Imran and Greg run you through the big Game Awards teases before getting lost in Cyberpunk 2077 stories.

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Happy Hannakuh! 
The Game Awards are tonight!
Andy is going to be streaming Cyberpunk 2077 showing off Ray Tracing and all that goodness on his Nvidia RTX 3080 TODAY from 1-3 PT and then Tuesday December 15th from  11-1 PT 
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:40 - New Smash Bros., Fortnite Characters Tonight  @ Game Awards
00:13:30 - Game Awards Future Class Revealed…
00:18:20 - Cyberpunk Aftermath
00:35:25 - Should reviewers stand up against CDPR for this? - Best Friends Q:Action Pat
00:45:30 - Do you guys think that fair criticism for this game is getting drowned out by excuses because people just really want to love this game or do you think the things being said are pretty accurate? - Best Friends Q:MangoJR
00:51:00 -  Ad  
00:55:00 - Next BioShock a Sandbox RPG? Darryn Bonthuys @ GameSpot
00:58:20 - Bad Robot Launches Internal Game Studio, Dean @ Venture Beat
01:02:02 - There’s an Alexa Pac-Man game… and it has a subscription
01:03:45 - Out today
01:05:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and The Game Awards Future Class’ Blessing
